title: Draymond Green and the Culture of Winning
description:
Shukri discusses the recent Draymond Green controversy, along with the idea of what it means to have a winning culture. Does it mean that the winners are morally superior? Does it mean that they are noble? Shukri will explore these ideas on this episode of The Class X Podcast.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/classxpodcast/message
